report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-30523 Trend Micro Password Manager Vulnerability
Rewterz Threat Advisory CVE-2022-30523 Trend Micro Password Manager Vulnerability
text: Trend Micro Password Manager could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by a link following vulnerability. By creating a symbolic link, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to abuse the service to delete a file and execute arbitrary code with SYSTEM privileges.
